While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

name: Shrieker

When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The
shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward.

senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6
